{'ingredient': 'fish'}.response: {'name': 'Name of Dish: Fried Fish with Orange Sauce', 'ingredients': ['-1 lb. fish fillets', '-1/2 cup all-purpose flour', '-1/2 teaspoon salt', '-1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '-1/4 cup olive oil', '-1/2 cup dry white wine', '-1/4 cup fresh orange juice', '-1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '-1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme'], 'instructions': ['1. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).', '2. Place the flour, salt, and pepper in a shallow bowl. Dredge the fish fillets in the flour mixture.', '3. Heat the olive oil in a large ovenproof skillet over high heat. Add the fish fillets and cook for 2 minutes per side, or until golden brown.', '4. Add the wine, orange juice, parsley, and thyme to the skillet. Bring the mixture to a boil.', '5. Place the skillet in the oven and bake for 10 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through.']}
